page.title: 13Recreation and Leisure
page.content:
Coatham has a tremendous number of recreation and leisure facilities.
In recent years the swimming baths have been rebuilt. The Council has also built a Sports/Leisure Centre opposite the baths. There are a uariety of activities available e.g. Squash, Badminton and Weight Training. Nearby there is a Golf Course, a new BMX Track and a Boating Lake.
The Redcar Bowl is used for Concerts and Competitions. The British Darts Championship has been held there for the past two years.
There is also an indoor Amusement Park which is very popular in the summer.
All these facilities are within five minutes walk of each other.
